SELECT s.station_id, s.station_name, se.section_name,cf.customfield_section_id, cf.customfield_name, cf.customfield_type, cf.customfield_id, cfv.customfieldsvalue_text_value, cfv.customfieldsvalue_numeric_value
FROM stations s INNER JOIN customfieldsvalues cfv ON s.station_id = cfv.customfieldsvalue_station_id INNER JOIN customfields cf ON cfv.customfieldsvalue_customfield_id = cf.customfield_id INNER JOIN sections se ON se.section_id = cf.customfield_section_id WHERE s.station_id=#{id}
